name: iBooks Author Document Template
summary: Learn about .IBATEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: iBooks Author includes several templates with the program installation.
NOTE: Once an iBook is complete, it can be uploaded directly to an iPad in the .IBOOKS format or submitted to the Apple iBookstore using the .ITMSP format.

description: Book design template created by iBooks Author, a program used to create digital books for the Apple iPad; stores design presets such as page layout and font settings; used as the starting point for a book design project (.IBA file).
